haushaltsreinigung.title: House Cleaning
haushaltsreinigung.shortDescription: Thorough cleaning for a fresh home.
description: Our house cleaning service ensures a well-maintained, hygienic, and cozy home. From the kitchen to the living room to the bedroom, we thoroughly and reliably clean all living areas.
We create customized cleaning plans tailored to your specific needs. Using eco-friendly cleaning agents and modern techniques, we deliver sparkling cleanliness.

buero-reinigung.title: Office Cleaning
buero-reinigung.shortDescription: Thorough cleaning for productive work environments.
description: A clean office is the foundation for efficient work and a positive impression on clients and partners. Our office cleaning service creates a professional, tidy, and hygienic workspace.
We offer flexible schedules—daily, weekly, or on request—and thoroughly clean all areas: desks, meeting rooms, kitchens, and restrooms. Our trained staff adheres to the highest standards.

fensterreinigung.title: Window Cleaning
fensterreinigung.shortDescription: Streak-free shine for a clear view.
description: Our professional window cleaning delivers streak-free, crystal-clear results—inside and out. Ideal for homes, apartments, and commercial spaces.
Using specialized cleaning products and trained staff, we safely and thoroughly clean even hard-to-reach windows.

teppichreinigung.title: Carpet Cleaning
teppichreinigung.shortDescription: Deep cleaning for fresh and hygienic carpets.
description: Our carpet cleaning removes deeply embedded dirt, bacteria, and odors—for a clean and healthy home.
We use modern equipment and gentle cleaning methods that protect your carpets while ensuring effective cleaning.

bauendreinigung.title: Post-Construction Cleaning
bauendreinigung.shortDescription: Professional cleaning after construction or renovation.
description: After construction work, we leave your property ready to move in. Our post-construction cleaning removes all debris, dust, and dirt.
We thoroughly clean all surfaces—from floors and windows to fixtures—ensuring perfect conditions for handover or move-in.

umzugsreinigung.title: Move-In/Out Cleaning
umzugsreinigung.shortDescription: Spotless results for handover when moving in or out.
description: Our move-in/out cleaning service prepares your apartment or house perfectly for handover—whether you're moving in or out.
We thoroughly clean kitchens, bathrooms, floors, and windows to ensure a clean, stress-free new beginning.

grundreinigung.title: Deep Cleaning
grundreinigung.shortDescription: Intensive cleaning for heavily soiled areas.
description: Deep cleaning is ideal for areas that are heavily used or haven't been cleaned in a long time. It removes deeply embedded dirt, limescale, and stubborn stains.
Perfect for annual intensive cleaning or before special events.

gartenpflege.title: Garden Care
gartenpflege.shortDescription: Maintenance and cleaning of your outdoor areas.
description: Our garden care service ensures a well-maintained, inviting appearance of your outdoor spaces. We carefully maintain lawns, flower beds, and walkways.
Regular maintenance not only increases your property's value but also your well-being at home.
